summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and regulating conditions hazardous to life and property from fire, hazardous materials or explosion; adopting by reference the Uniform Fire Code, 1997 Edition, and 1997 Uniform Fire Code Standards; and repealing Seattle Municipal Code Chapter 22.600 and Ordinances 118018, 118019, 118436 and 118574; and adopting a new Seattle Municipal Code Chapter 22.600.
